definition: a strong wooden or metal post with a point at one end so it can be driven into the ground, place a bet on
details:
noun
- a strong wooden or metal post with a point at one end so it can be driven into the ground
- instrument of execution consisting of a vertical post that a victim is tied to for burning
- a pole or stake set up to mark something (as the start or end of a race track)
= synonyms: post
- (law) a right or legal share of something
= synonyms: interest
- the money risked on a gamble
= synonyms: bet
verb
- place a bet on
= synonyms: punt
- kill by piercing with a spear or sharp pole
= synonyms: impale
- mark with a stake
= example: mark with a stake
= synonyms: post
- tie or fasten to a stake
= example: tie or fasten to a stake
- put at risk
= example: put at risk
= synonyms: adventure
